name: Fail2Ban
description: Ensures Fail2Ban intrusion prevention is active and restarts it if inactive.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active fail2ban >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then if service fail2ban status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'running\|active'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart fail2ban || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then service fail2ban restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if command -v fail2ban-client >/dev/null 2>&1; then if fail2ban-client status >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active fail2ban >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi; else echo ok; fi
